name: Brooklyn H
text: I was recommended and I myself, would recommend. It took about 2 1/2 weeks to get everything we NEEDED done. they were very upfront about the cost, how long it would take, and gave us a run down of everything that needed repaired & basically a general overview. We got what we originally came for the first week & after they noticed a few minor issues, we had them fixed within the next week. Still needs work but they got us up and running! they recommend affordable places to buy parts as well. I am confident that this business will give you the best work and if they feel they can’t, they will recommend you somewhere that can!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Bloody Hatchetz
text: Had a vehicle towed from my house to Integrity cause of it not running . This car didn't have much problems only needed parts put on that I already had that I stored in car . My car sat in there parking lot for 2 weeks and was not touched by them . I did call them 3 times asking for any updates and was told by them  it would be done on a Monday . I waited till Friday of same week and got fed up on waiting . I had another shop come with there towing truck . I would not recommend  Integrity ! They are also rude as I was only wanting updates.  They told me if I could do it faster then come get it so I did .

name: PB and J Aquatics
text: They lie and delay.  Don't take your vehicle there if you expect to use it for several months .  Mine sat there so long that mice made a nest in the wiring harness.

name: alice gaylor
text:
I am purchasing a new (used) vehicle that is in need of some repairs and Integrity is where the car lot took it to be serviced. I stopped by today (my first time ever being there) to check on the progress and was VERY impressed. Although my car isn't ready, Ryan and a couple of other employees were SO helpful and informative about everything going on with it. I never felt rushed or like I was being a burden for stopping by. As a matter of fact, they were trying to get the air in my truck going for me so I would have AC until my car gets fixed!! Unfortunately it wasn't able to be fixed but just the kindness and courtesy these guys showed was refreshing!!! I will definitely be using them for my go to shop from now on!!

****Updated Review****

HUGE shout out to the employees at Integrity!!! All the way from Robert, to Liz, Brian, and Doug.....you guys absolutely rock!!!!! Not only have you guys fixed the original car issues, but you helped me get the other things taken car of as well. I was greeted with a smile and excellent customer service EVERY time I stopped in and have nothing but praise for you guys!! Thanks so much for everything!!!

name: Jamie Allison
text: well they lie a lot and they just don’t do good business so I do not recommend I hope whoever sees this goes to someone better do not trust them up there we had our car up there and they messed everything up so just go to someone better🙂

name: Draco Palioxis
text: I had my car taken up here to get the Rack and Pinion and 2 rims fixed. They did all this unnecessary work like fix my bumper that wasnt broken and repainted my car for no reason. I have had this car in there for about a month now and I finally get a call from my insurance, NOT THE COMPANY MY CAR IS WITH, telling me that my car was totaled. And now I have no car in order to do my job in anymore. I highly would not recommend this place for any sort of repairs or fixing of your vehicles.

name: Mark Lanier
text: 5 star service. They will have all my vehicle maintenance work from here on out. I had my truck towed to them they had the problem diagnosed and fixed by the next afternoon. They called and let me know what was going on and what it would take to fix before doing anything. They took all my warranty so my cost was just the deductible from my warranty. Great people and customer service.

name: Josh Mckleroy
text: Had transmission rebuilt in September of 2019 had to take it back 2 days later because it was leaking fluid where the transmission bolts to the transfer case. Then around Christmas I realized the 4 wheel drive didn't work called up there and was told someone would call me back and they never did and done this multiple times for the next year and in November 2020 the transmission has went completely out after 14 months and 16000 miles owner blocked me on social media because he knows he has done wrong and hopefully by sharing my experience I can save someone the hassle and money so they don't waste $1800 like it did

name: P M
text: Not sure why the rating for this business is so high. As a mechanic I can say that I have seen some terrible work come from this shop, and I have seen some very upset customers who have lost thousands of dollars by trusting these guys. I’m making this post because today I ran across a third car they “worked on” and for the third time the repair they performed was unnecessary, and did not fix the issue. And for the second time, the work they did actually caused additional issues.

name: Karen Patterson
text: Super place too have work done on your car! Friendly, helpful staff and the work performed  is always priced reasonably and completed in a good time frame. I only have 1 vehicle so I can't wait several days or more for my car to be repaired. I've used Integrity for a couple of years now and am always satisfied with the quality of the work performed and the cost for same.

name: Chris Holmes
text: This morning I dropped off my car at 9 by 1030 they had my oil changed and air fixed.  I was a walk in and was blown away by their customer service.  There was no profanity or nasty jokes that you typically hear at a shop. They truly live up to their name. They also fixed my blinker for free. Hands down best place to work on your vehicle. I want be going anywhere else from now on. Highly recommend

name: Anthony Durante
text: They do a real  good job!

name: Beth Condit
text: The people were very nice but we were charged over $1000 and we still had the issue when we picked the truck up. When we went back in they told us it was something else and would cost over $400 to get that repair done. They misdiagnosed the issue and wanted us to pay for another costly repair. I will not be using them again. They also did not disclose there is a 4% charge for using a credit card until after the repair was done.

resp.text:
Not true at all. Your truck needed a new rack , alignment and brakes was gone on the front. I talk to your husband and told him after we fix the know problems we found you also needed a clock spring. And as far as the charge on the credit card company I also talk to your husband about that. Their are signs in the service department hanging and on back of the computes about credit card company.
I'm sorry you feel the way you do. We could have fixed the clock spring but also talked to your husband about that.
My name is Robert I'm the owner of the shop I'm asking you to give me a call about this 2567354000
We can only fix what the customers allow us to fix.
Good thing is still have front rotors and pads that was on truck and the rack also so your more than welcome to come see them.

name: Amber Jones
text: We used them one time to get a radiator hose replaced. They told us they would also do a full inspection and call us to let us know if there was or wasn't anything else found. Never heard from anyone. Figured maybe they got busy and we just let it go. Just last week we figured let's give them another shot because the service was great last time.... My husband called to find out how much brakes and rotors would cost us and they told him they would call him back with that info.... We never heard from them. Customer service isn't the greatest. Friendly service in person. Just don't expect a call back.

resp.text:
I'm sorry for not getting a call back. We are down 2 people in service department.  Can't find help. I know that is no excuse but I hope you come back and give us another chance.
If you have any other problems please call me Robert Taylor 256 735 6808 my personal cell

name: Loris the win
text: I went to integrity auto on yesterday because I was scared. I’m a single mom trying to provide for her family. This vehicle is my lifeline to work, food, church and pleasure. My engine light came on 11 days ago. I called them and the guy got me in there Immediately, took care of me ASAP, fixed the problem and sent me on my way. Christian based facility.... you guys and gals are God SENT!!! You rock.🤩🤩 I love me sum Integrity Automotive!!!

name: Susan Comperda
text: Our van broke down In Cullman while traveling from Huntsville to Birmingham. We were lucky to stumble upon Integrity. The local Enterprise has closed down so we had to rent a Uhaul to travel to Birmingham. The owner happily drove us to the local Uhaul and his team got to work on our vehicle. Thank you for going above and beyond!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words

name: danielle johnson
text: EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!! Highly satisfied with my visit. As a woman, most shops will try to take advantage but not this place. Everyone, from the mechanics to the customer service desk, was so kind. The mechanics took the time to explain what needed to be done to fix my car and even showed me what was wrong. I really appreciated that. I had to stay at the shop while they fixed my car, they knew I needed to get home by a certain time and they made sure to get me back on the road in that time frame. I will never go anywhere else. My encounter with everyone who works there definitely lived up to the business name. Thank you Integrity!!

name: Marilyn Stewart
text: So thankful to find a trustworthy place for vehicle repairs.  Nicest people you could ever deal with. Quality work.  Will surely use for all repairs.

name: Eric Trahan
text: My car died on the interstate. I called them and they had it towed to the shop. Timing belt broke. They are going to replace the engine which is going to be expensive but they are working with me on that. Everyone I've talked to had treated me with respect and have been very pleasant. I'll update this review when I get my car back.

name: Kelsie West
text: My husband took his truck here explaining the problem to begin with, when it was dropped off. $3,400 dollars later and over at the least one month later and that problem was never fixed (was not told that until pickup today) along with after picking it up smoke came from the tail pipe and the air conditioner is not blowing cold even though they took it upon themselves to service the AC and charging $89 for that without notice. Neither of those problems were occurring prior to dropping it off. Needless to say, the truck was dropped back off to them within 30 minutes of pickup. We will be speaking with the so called mechanic on Monday. They also have problems with taking and returning calls. The only good thing I can say is that the owner Robert was nice and friendly. Let’s just see if they can make this right and I will come back and edit this post. But for now I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS SHOP, PERIOD.

name: Tiffani Johnson
text: I can't say enough good things about this company! Awesome experience with them, they replaced front rotors and brake pads on our car. They were VERY honest through the whole process. Was in and out within an hour, they didn't gouge us either! Highly, highly recommend them for any of your automotive needs!

resp.text: Thank you so much and for your business to our shop.

name: The Smith’s
text: Run! I took my car in for a noise on with my passenger side, water coming into my floorboard and ac not cooling. They charged my extended warranty over $1700 to redo my ac and I paid another $1200 for my front end work. The first week I had my car back it started making an awful noise. I took my car to another mechanic and he found that Integrity put no bolts in one of my brakes and it fell behind the caliber. The mechanic said he couldn’t believe I didn’t have an accident. I took it back in 6/15 due to the ac pouring water and still having a front end noise. They had my car until the afternoon of the 19th and said they had everything fixed. We left for vacation the 20th and half way to our destination the ac started pouring water in the passenger floorboard when it’s on. I’ve had my car back since the 19th of June but it’s sat in my barn the past 3 weeks. My transmission light is now on and it won’t shift gears. I had ABSOLUTELY NO problems with my transmission prior to my car going there and my AC now leaks constantly. I’m to the point of getting an attorney. I saw it was a veteran owned business and being that my husband is a veteran as well, I thought it would be great to support them. This is the biggest mistake I could have made.

resp.text: Fake customer

name: James Turner
text: Was exactly what mechanic said it was no more...very reasonably priced no hassle  in and out very pleased with time line will do all my work there

name: James Bice
text: They did an outstanding job working on my car they got it running right and did an oil change and time up plus the best part they came in on a Saturday morning when they was closed just to work on my car now that is customer service they will always have my business

name: South Cullman
text: I normally am very picking about my car. I brought it up there on my lunch break to have my oil changed and they got my car straight back. I was pleased with the service. Everyone was VERY friendly. Doug at the desk talked to me on the phone and had the guy waiting for me to get there. He was super polite when I got there and made sure everything was taken care of. The guy that changed my oil was very friendly. I felt right at home. Great place overall. All the guys in the shop are great!

name: Brittany Sterling
text: My husband used this place and they are very rude and unprofessional !

name: Garrett Bowers
text: Had my daughters 01 explorer fixed by Doug canter and the guys at integrity auto a few months ago. Car runs like a top would recommend this company to anyone. Fair price and great service

name: Greg Talks
text: These guys took my car that I thought couldn’t be fixed inside their body shop and made it look like new! They were able to use a lot of the same parts so I didn’t have to spend a lot of money for new parts. They’re fast, efficient, and economical!

name: Tammy Allums
text: I have used them several times and they always take me on short notice and get me in and out in a reasonable time. They are very nice and pleasant to deal with.

name: Bobby Hudson
text: No matter what problem big or small I am having with any of my vehicles, Ryan and Doug have always came through for me and even the mechanics help explain the problem and the solution for it. I recommend these guys to anyone especially my friends and family because I know all the guys at Integrity will treat them with respect. Honest service writers and mechanics that truly live up to the name Integrity Auto Group

name: Lisa Bates
text: Very very friendly people. I will only take my car to them from now on. Great service they all make you feel at home.

name: SFW CEO
text:
A company for the community! We use them for all our work on the vehicles we have donated. Robert Taylor Jr. Is a standup guy and loves giving back to his customers and community!

There paint and  body shop have some of the best in the business painting small cars, restores and big rigs! They have one of our jeeps painting it now and have done a great job!!

name: Stephanie Hill
text: Great place for all your car's needs! Ask for Dixie! She is awesome! Will help you with anything you need! Love her!!❤❤

name: Alicia Powe
text: Integrity treated my parents exceptional by helping repair their 2010 Chey Equinox. After several attempts to fix it at other places, Integrity fixed the transmission with a 1 year warranty and replaced a bad axel.  Providing financing and everyone was extremely friendly😊Thank you Integrity! 🙌 💯

resp.text: Thank you. Your mom and dad we sweets hearts

name: tommy smith
text: Had my car at Integrity Auto for 4 days at $493. Picked it up after hours and when backing out of the parking spot, realized it was doing exactly what I brought it to the shop for. Took it to another mechanic shop who within an hour told me what was wrong with it and it did not need the parts that was put on. So $493 in unnecessary parts. Tried numerous times to talk with them about this but can’t seem to get a return phone call. Bad thing is I actually have known and used them for a long time but not anymore. I bet my phone will ring now.

resp.text: Talk talk with Tommy and this has been took care of.

name: Samantha Best
text: Best service in town. They get you in and out in no time. Very friendly honest and reliable people. Please go see them for all your repairs,I promise you will be satisfied that’s a guarantee.

name: Annette Munger
text: Thank you to the guys at Integrity! You made my life easier by coming and getting my truck for brakes and tires.

name: Elizabeth Speegle
text: We have used Integrity on several occasions. Fast response time. Gentlemen are helpful and have car back to you in a reasonable time table... Helpful owner and knowledgeable.

name: Amy Canter
text: This place is amazing! They were able to work me in with a short notice for my air conditioning. One thing I noticed was that 3 women came in behind me and they were great with them and didn’t try to overcharge them. I will be back!!

name: Judy Lowery
text: Honest and GREAT service. Friendly people from the owner to the employees   I will only take my car to them

name: Tim Bliss
text: This place is great!! They offer the best personalized service at the absolute lowest price.

resp.text: Thanks Tim please help us get the word out about Integrity Auto Group

name: Heather O'Rear
text: Great shop with great people.  Big shout out to Doug for explaining everything and giving best prices he could! Will recommend to friends and family!!

name: Tanya Lynn
text: Very nice and very helpful. Will definitely use them again!

name: Christopher Sumners
text: This is the best place in Cullman. If you know what you need done or need help to figure it out. Integrity got it for you.

name: Misty Teets
text: I called on a Thursday evening he fit me in on Friday installed a water pump and thermostat for me at a great price and an amazing turn around team I recommend these guys hands down and will be using them again

name: Nicole Jett
text: These guys go above and beyond to provide excellent service at a reasonable price.

name: Aj Rapper
text: They have excellent customer service...fast in friendly in they will work with you to get the job done.definetly are out go to place for all our car needs

name: Visual Lacey
text: Great group of guys to work on any of your vehicles. They Always get me what I need for less than anyone else around, and always get me in immediately with no wait. Couldn’t say better things about this business!

name: Integrity Auto Group
text:
This place is the best . Always the best service and price in Cullman. Transmission service and rebuild is out of this world.
Very Honest they don't try to up sale you on everything.

name: Richard Jones
text: I cant see taking my vehicles anywhere else! Always prompt friendly service with very reasonable prices.

name: April German
text: Honest people and great place to bring your car! Does a lot for our community as well. Highly recommended.

name: Rhys Battles
text: Friendly service. Goes beyond what the customer expects. I know the owner and many of the workers have stayed well past 5 to help the customer get where they need to go

name: Nakki Kane
text: Doug Canter is amazing, especially for younger females that don’t know anything about mechanics. He did an excellent job at explaining things in terms that I could understand without making me feel dumb. I couldn’t recommend a better person to see for all things vehicle related.

name: Brandy Hayes
text: Great honest and dependable shop. They have done all the repairs to our 2 vehicles. I wouldn’t recommended anyone else!

name: Hannah Stewart
text: Very very nice people will break their back to help anyone in need! They’ll work around and try to actually help you! I highly recommend them!!

name: Amy Glimpse
text: Friendly and courteous service... Thanks for a job well done!

name: Kim Carwell
text: Integrity, has been great for me as a female it is hard for us to find a shop that will be honest.  I recommend Integrity, to all females and veterans it has been great for me and I would go anywhere else.

name: Marie Arwood
text:
I’m proud that Mr Taylor made the decision to allow his employees to enroll in Aflac! It really shows he cares about his employees and business.
I would most definately recommend Integrity Auto Group for all your automotive needs!

name: Rachel Pace
text: Very friendly and honest group. Will definitely come back

resp.text: Thank you

name: Kelly Best
text: Thank you integrity Auto group for fixing Renee Beasley's car and getting her back on the road y'all done a fantastic great job

name: Kesha Sandlin
text: They did a customer appreciation day over the summer an i got a free oil change Doug had me in an out in no time

name: Local 360
text: Great job changing plugs & distributors quickly & within budget on my Ford F150

name: Daniela Bartlett
text: Love these guys. Always accommodating and professional!!

name: Mandi Easterwood
text: My husband and myself both have had our brake pads and rotors replaced here. Excellent  and friendly  service.Also received excellent customer service from Dixie Hall.

name: Tripp Taylor
text: Great place to take your vehicle! Great customer service and lowest prices!

name: Michael Doc Elston
text: A very polite and skilled group of mechanics. I will be returning here.

name: misty cason
text: They are great people and are very friendly and will do everything they can to help u..

name: Doug Canter
text: Great people are and amazing service would definitely recommend them to everyone!!! Owners and management are very Knowledgeable and helpful

name: Troy McGraw
text:
Great people, great service, with honest and fair pricing.
You won't be disappointed.

name: Ashley Payne
text: The mechanics are amazing along with the rest of the staff! Very friendly and know exactly what they're doing.

name: Dustin Miller
text: Coustomer service is great! They work hard to get you exactly what you need!

name: jason hills
text:
Honest and veary nice great prices couldn't have ben more pleased.
THANK YOU

resp.text: Thank you

name: Brandy Thrasher
text: Great experience ! Oil change was quick and very reasonably priced .

name: Chrislandon Orear
text: Doug Canter had us in and out in no time. Would highly recommend!

name: Joseph Bell
text: Great service and friendly staff, got me in quick and work was high quality

name: Amanda Treptau
text: A great place to take your vehicle for quick service at a great price!

name: Nancy Yeager
text: Great service awsome company  they go above and beyond in customer service

name: Christy Miller
text: Best service around Cullman! They stop at nothing to get your car working again!

name: Mike Pritchard
text: Great place for any Automotive needs. Mechanical,  Used cars, Auto Body repair.

name: Lynn Jones

name: J. Lewis

text: Good

resp.text: Thank you for using integrety Auto Group LLC

text: 10/10 they are the best!

name: Paul Chaney
text: Best repair shop in Cullman

resp.text: Thank for your business to our shop.

name: jennifer heinl
text: Love this place and the owners!

name: Robert Taylor
text: Best in the business

name: Cassandra Hernandez
text: Hard worker's

name: Tom F
text: Greg was great to work with, very responsive and professional.

name: Tim Whigham
text: Great job on motorcycle tank repair , very professional work . If your looking for someone to repair the fuel tank on your motorcycle , all I can say is look no further.      THANKS  BRANDON

name: Thomas Beck
text: I thought it was a little expensive. Had to pass

resp.text: Thanks for considering our service, sorry we were not able to help.

name: Aaron Travis
text: Excellent job. Very fast turnaround and affordable pricing. Recommend for anyone looking to paint a vehicle

name: Alex Cross
text: I paid $497 total for a metallic paint job on my 2005 Pontiac Vibe. I was a little skeptical because of the low price, but I was shocked by how good the paint looked when I came to pick up my car 5 days later. There's some minor overspray on the trim and lights but for the price I can't complain, it looks 100 times better. I would definitely recommend going here for a decent paint job on a budget.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your business and for taking the time to post a review!

name: Angela Hollis
text: They were nice and friendly. Prices have gone up since my first car was painted 5 years ago but looks like everyone is feeling the " pinch" everywhere you go.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We have raised our prices for the first time in many years. Unfortunately, it was time as our paint and materials have gone up considerably.

name: Crishawnna Thomas
text: Great First Time Experience 💗. Just Communicate What You Want & They Will Be Straight Forward, Willing To Give You What You Need.

resp.text: Thank you for the shout out!

name: Jasmine Briggins
text:
This place is horrible. I initially went here for a paint job on January 30,2021 i had selected the color forest green and they painted my car the same color it was when i first brought it in which was black. They took some money off and agreed to do it the right color on March 1st after picking up my car the next following days they still didn’t paint my car the color i chose they painted my car a turquoise which is nowhere near close to a forest green color. At this point i
I’m over them and how they conduct business because clearly they do whatever they want although you choose the color you want. They’re extremely unprofessional. Never again i would not recommend them to anyone.

name: Will Hunter
text: I took my vehicle to this establishment. I was told that it would take one week to finish! 10 days later they didn't even move it.  When I took my vehicle there it was only 3 cars on the lot! Then the manager had the nerve to tell me it would be another week before painting it! Really! I don't recommend AT ALL!

name: jason hughes
text:
I have a 30 year-old SUV that had been spray painted with cans by a previous owner.  Econo Auto Paint in Fairfield repaired it and made it look new again.  I got the top paint that Econo offers.  I also had some minor body work done (couple of dents and a few small holes in roof) and they did a great job.  Econo was also able to apply a newer paint color code specific to the manufacturer and matched it perfect.  I did have a couple of small issues, but no big deal:  There were some very small areas of overspray that I wiped-off with some solvent and a rag.  Also, they didn’t bolt my windshield wiper arms back on the car and I found out after it started raining the next day that I didn’t have wipers.

Econo was the lowest of 2 other quotes I received by $1,500.  Also, my car was ready when they said it would be.  Bottom line, if you want an older car looking good at an affordable price, visit Econo.  If you want a $10,000 mirror finish on your Ferrari, go somewhere else. I will be taking my 2006 car to them soon.  Thanks Econo.

name: jonathan lark
text: Everyone I spoke with was polite and cut up with me and made the experience. I needed an all over paint job & these guys knocked it out of the park. I did a lot of the prep work myself because of my OCD. LOL....... yes i did have minor issues, some tape on lights, etc.. . But overall great job... I would let them spray any of my cars... "Now n' Later" car turned out great.....

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and the great review! It's always fun to work with customers like you and we hope to see you again with the next project.

name: Deborah Hatchett
text: They are professional. Cannot beat the job for the cost.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the shout out, our goal is always to offer value for money.

name: James Cruso
text: If you want a cheap paint job go there you get what you pay for

resp.text: Our aim is to offer value for money. You are exactly right, if someone is looking for a custom paint job, that's not what we do. Thank you.

name: Billy Ritch
text: Friendly folks, great price on a budget paint job for an older car. They provided exactly what i requested. Would definitely use again.

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to post a review. We appreciate your business and look forward to the next time!

name: Arnold Benedict
text: Great customer services. Very affordable paint jobs.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Rebecca Powell
text: Thanks for the bumper paint job after andd before  photo

resp.text: Thank you!

name: vonyabutfly johnsonjemison
text: Reasonable prices and greater view

resp.text: Thank you for posting, we only wish we had earned a 5 star review. Feel free to let us know how we could have improved our service. Thank you.

name: CantBeAfraid ToTry
text: Friendly staff and knowledgeable.  Great prices too

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jeffrey Malone
text: Did a poor job on my truck

resp.text: We would like to look into this situation for you and try to resolve any issues. If you would reply here with the date of service and a work order number we will certainly look into it. Thank you.

name: Octavia Hall
text: I would recommend this company to anyone. Very friendly environment, customer service was excellent. I got an full body paint on my (black,same color)Toyota Corolla 1994, for a affordable price. Their work was surperb, I was skeptical at first because  I read some bad reviews ,but I had a great experience. I ran into a minor problem ,but it was quickly handle with no hesitation.

name: alyssa isaac
text: Y'all did a Superior job. I Will Definitely Be Back.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We look forward to working with you again (and your friends and family!).

name: Israel Velasquez
text: Great people Great work

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Rochelle Robertson
text: The work they did on my vehicle was decent! As far as customer service very rude, disrespect and deceiving! I took my vehicle to them to fixed a minor scratch on my paint on the back of my vehicle and to push my bumper back in to place(which they didn't fixed the bumper) on Friday around noon  and because the guy with The Kid from House Party Fro told me they would be done in a day. So he asked when I needed it back and I told him on Monday noon  and he told me Oh  it will be ready by lunch time. So I got a rental from Friday at 1pm to Monday at 1pm! I called around 11am on Monday and asked was it ready and he told me it will not be ready  at 5pm because the paint wasn't dry and they still needed to clean and detail the vehicle (which they didn't clean nor detail nothing)(Which also tell me you all just started on my car on Monday morning when it been their since Friday) So I said that you told me by lunch time and 5 pm is dinner and this boy told me that 5pm not lunch time to me so you say! So of course I called the rental place to extend the rental for a extra day because my daughter had a doctor's appointment at 2pm on Monday that could not be missed! So I asked the young man on Tuesday morning because it was an inconvenience  can they take some off the price because I had to extend my rental and you told me it would be by lunch time yesterday and was not ready? He told me he could not so I ask him is it someone over him that I could talk to?  So after I talk to the other manager he have lie to him making seem like the car was ready at 1pm and trying to make it seem like I'm lying and it was just not right at all! I don't recommend this place to nobody!!!! If you have to spend your  money for someone to belittle you like that!   Nobody deserve to be talk to or disrespected in that matter! They left little minor paint in places! Ugh Just don't Go!

name: Terrence Harris
text: Good work for the money ...cant beat them. Great prices and very fast turn out....love this place.

resp.text: Thank you! It's great to hear from our happy customers! Econo Auto Painting

name: FRANKIE WILLIAMS
text:
They’re very friendly, there’s a fat dued
Sitting at the desk sleeping when you walk in, it stinks.
I left my car to fix right side bumper, they told me they would take care of it.
The hood of my car was faded so I decided to let them paint the car
My car was gray, I wanted it painted back the same color gray.
When I got it back my car is purple.

Please everyone I know you can’t afford
Those high prices of paint jobs, but if you go this route, you’re gonna get what you pay for.

Don’t do this to yourself!

Maybe they do a better job
Else where at ECONO paint,
But the one in Fairfield,Al.
Is a big joke.
These guys can’t paint or fix anything.
My bumper is still in bad shape, with bad paint job.😂🥺

name: Danyelle Varner
text: Horrible horrible horrible!!!! I wouldn't even recommend them painting a bicycle. My car looked better before I took it in with the dent. They didn't inform me they couldn't do the pinstripe now half my car doesn't have it. They act like they had nothing to say about it. The paint doesn't match. The bumper looks like they just held the old one together while the glue dried to keep it in place...it's still cracked and just looks painted over. This was very sorry work now I have to find a PROFESSIONAL to do the actual repairs!

resp.text: Ms. Varner, we take reviews very seriously and will look into your issues. We hope your name here is the one on the invoice so we can find the records and try to resolve your problems. Someone will be in contact with you in the coming days.

name: Bruce Lenart
text: Excellent service...Great Job at a reasonable cost...Car looks like new great match on the paint color...very satisfied...Roll Tide!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your detailed review! It means a lot to hear from our happy customers. Thanks again. Econo Fairfield

name: Mariah Hunter
text: Very satisfied with the work! Will do business again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for posting, we never get tired of hearing from our happy customers! Econo Auto Painting

text: Good

name: Jorge F. Rodriguez
text: I have been in the automotive business as. Pre-owned  Manager and deal and have dealt with many body shops. Back in November my wife and I had an accident in Anniston Alabama. Unfortunately we had to leave our car their and rent a car and drive back home to Miami Florida. Never did I expect the amazing quality of work , service and attention that they gave me. Conchetta Ward tended to me long distance. I was concern because I didn’t know the town or anyone their. She was amazing in the professional but in the way yet made me feel like I knew her a very long time. Their was a small issue when I get the car back but they where extremely quick to respond and took care of the issue. In live things will happen but like I always said it’s not what happens but how it handle and they handle it great. I very highly recommend them!!

resp.text:
Jorge,

We are so pleased to hear how great your experience was and that the Anniston team could assist you with the repairs to your vehicle and that the process was smooth and completed in a timely manner. We sincerely appreciate the positive feedback and hope you have a wonderful day!

text: Nice friendly people that helped me with my car accident repair .

text: Chris was on time! Very polite. Told me it would take 1 hour to get a dent out. He was done in 20 minutes and the car looks like brand new. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the business. If you have anything else please let me know.

name: Sean Laughlin
text: Wow. There was a quarter sized dent in the quarter panel of my Porsche 911. Chris did a great job at a reasonable price, and i can't even find/remember where the dent was. I was out of town and he came to my mechanic's shop to do the work. He took PayPal and the Porsche specialist shop I use (momentum motorworks) said it's the best PDR they have seen. Would give 6 stars if I could!

name: Patrick Herring
text: Showed up on time and did an excellent job for a very reasonable price. Highly recommended.

name: Libby Worthington
text: Chris was quick to respond to my texts.  He provided a free, zero obligation quote.  He quickly set an appointment and was exceptionally flexible and understanding when I had to cancel.  He rescheduled for the next day.  He completed the work in a short amount of time while I was at work.  He did an amazing job!  You cannot tell there was ever any dent.  His pricing was a fraction of what the repairs would have cost at a body shop and my original paint was preserved.  Fantastic work!

name: Jodi Steltenpohl
text: Great job taking out tiny dings of one vehicle and removing a dent from a wreck on another! Thanks so much!

name: George lancaster
text: Had a ding on my new Ram which I didn't think could be fixed like new.  Called Chris and he completed the project and I was amazed!  Cannot see where the ding was!  He came to my work place and completed the job while I worked.  Excellent work, excellent price.  I couldn't be happier and definitely recommend Carsmetic for for all your cosmetic needs.

resp.text: Thank You For The Review. If You Need Anything Else George Please Give Me A Call. Thanks Again.

text: I had a small dent in my bumper of Toyota Corolla . Chris showed up at my place and fixed quickly. Great works with great savings. I highly recommend him

resp.text: Thank you very much. If you ever get anything else please call again.

name: Hank Wegener
text: I called to get a dent in my hood repaired. He took care of that. He also took care of a 3 to 4 year old deep ding in my passenger door while he was there. All for a very fair price in my opinion!

name: James Bausch
text: Chris did an outstanding job of repairing a small dent in the hood of my car, which is only 5 months old.

name: Neal Chandler
text: I sent a text with pictures of my dent and got an immediate response and set up a spot and time the next day.Met up with Chris he got right to work. Did a little assessing and started on my dent. I had me a seat and let him do his thing he was done in no time. You cant even tell there was a dent in a black truck too. Its flawless. Dont hesitate to give him a call.  Quality work.

name: Jim Sanders
text: Chris responded quickly to my call and fixed my dent the next day as promised.  He came to my house so it was very convenient. I could not tell where the dent had been. Looked good as new.

name: scott f
text: Right on time, Great price and grade A service! Cant tell my Lexus ever had a dent in it . Chris saved me a ton of $$$$ .

name: Kim Hill
text:
I would highly recommend Chris for anyone needing Paintless Dent Repair. I am so happy I found him online. Initially I called because he has great reviews on Google. I’m so glad I did, because the positive reviews are well-deserved.

Door dings will happen, but it had been less than a week since the purchase of my new car — so I was pretty bummed when I left my office, walked to my car, and saw that someone had dinged my passenger side door. I got online and found Carsmetic on Google. Chris responded right away, with a very reasonable estimate. The next day, he repaired the dent in less than an hour. The results are amazing — the door looks like it did the day I bought my car.

I cannot say enough about Chris and the excellent service he provided. Fast, honest, great results — he is a true craftsman in the art of PDR.

resp.text: Thank you please call again if you have any problems.

name: Harold Riker
text: Chris is a great guy, was on time and did a great job.  Will definitely use again if I ever have a need for this type of work.

name: Justin Hamblin
text:
I'm a car guy... very meticulous about my vehicles. About a week ago, a co-worker opened his door and put a ding in my door. Small problem... major issue for me.

I was told by one company that they didn't want to touch it. It was on a crease and he was scared of causing more damage. I contacted Chris and had the best experience!

He worked around my schedule... came to my place of work.... and had it looking brand new in no time! Quoted me high and charged me true for the work needed! My co-worker is thankful too!

Great communication! Terrific Service! He has my business from here on out!

name: Jason Clemons
text: Chris was fantastic. He arrived in a timely manner and repaired a dent in the front quarter panel of my car. He was even able to perform the repair at my workplace. The repair was completed quickly and there was no visible evidence of the dent after the repair. I highly recommend Chris at Carsmetic for any PDR needs.

text: Very professional and courteous. He responded quickly to my text and did a great job repairing the dent. While he was there he looked at another vehicle of mine and repaired it the next day. I highly recommend.

text: These guys are top notch. I feel like I have a new car. name: Cassandra Naylor
text: I definitely recommend Gerber.  You would never know my car had been wrecked.  The employees are very professional.  They give you updates on your car which is also great.  I am so pleased with they work.  Thank you all at Gerber Collision!!

resp.text: Cassandra, wonderful to hear that the team did such a great job you're not able to tell it was in a previous wreck. We are happy they were also so professional and provided great communication! Thank you!!

text: The employees at Gerber were very polite and helpful. I went there because of an accident when State Farm recommended them. They made the front of my car look like new!

Linda,
It is wonderful to hear that our team treated you so well and made your car look like new! We truly appreciate your taking the time to leave this feedback and hope you have a great day!

name: william powell
text:
Great Place and Friendly Staff.
They had my car for a week, got it back today. My BMW looks as good today as the day I bought it. My car was cleaned inside and outside even my rims shine. Nice job guys !
I hope there's not a next time but if there is I know where to bring my car.

resp.text: William, its great to hear that the Moody team for your BMW back to you in such a timely matter and made sure to give it back to you all clean and looking better then ever!!! We hope to see you again in the future, if needed! Safe travels!

name: Jerry Pellegrini
text: This place is hands down one of the best and most professional body shops I've ever had the pleasure of working with.  They called within 30 minutes of filing the insurance claim to perform the estimate.  The estimate was ready the same day we dropped it off, the work started immediately after the estimate was complete.  We got regular text message updates on the progress AND the car looks fantastic!

resp.text:
Jerry,

We are so pleased to hear how great your experience was and that the Moody team could assist you with the repairs to your vehicle and that the process was smooth and completed in a timely manner. We sincerely appreciate the positive feedback and hope you have a wonderful day!

name: Kelly Frost
text: The night before Thanksgiving I hit a deer on the way to the gas station. Gerber Collision (Moody) made the process quick and painless! In less than a week I was back in my truck! They kept me informed throughout the process and made sure all my questions were answered! They even took care of my rental return to Enterprise! 10/10 overall experience from drop off to pick up!

resp.text: Kelly, its awesome to hear that the Moody team was able to get your vehicle in and out of repairs in such a timely manner and you had such a great experience overall! We hope to see you again in the future, if needed!

name: Camron Morgan
text: Highly recommend using these guys! Had my bumper replaced and can't even tell anything was ever wrong with the car. The paint looks great and was updated through calls the whole time.

name: Sam NA
text: UPDATE: I spoke with Kevin and he acknowledged that there needs to be a more thorough inspection under certain circumstances. I felt comfortable speaking to him and believe that any customer service issue that I have will be satisfactory resolved if I choose to use them in the future. Original  Review. Not impressed, they were slow, one customer and walked right by me. Quote was incomplete and the guy helping me didn't know what he was doing.

name: JENNIFER BROOKS
text: Absolutely love this place... great people who are friendly and experienced experts. My vehicle was rear ended and damaged pretty bad and these guys repaired it so well that you couldn't ever noticed it had even been in a accident. They matched the paint perfect! Good job to all of you guys and supervisors who helped fix my ride...😃

name: taron hodge
text: Great experience, staff was courteous, and experienced. Quick turn- around, highly recommended

text:
They were just so nice and very professional. I came in with my bumper popped up and the fixed free!!!
It was just a matter of putting the clip back together.
Thank you.

text: Great service and these guys are really good at what they do.

text: Great body shop, quick turn around and accepts most insurance jobs. A shop you can trust.

name: Charles Speakman
text: They do really good work and you can trust them they will make you happy

name: Febra McGuire
text: Keey your car too long

resp.text: Febra, thank you for your feedback and we want to sincerely apologize for any inconveniences this may have caused you. We understand that Wally N. has contacted you and spoke to you regarding the back order of the items for your vehicle. We want to thank you for letting us address your concerns.

name: Robert McDonald
text: These guys did a great job on my truck repairs.

name: Orrin Carter
text: Worst experience in my life! I wouldn’t send my enemy to this place! I should have followed my first mind to not let my truck be taken there. Thinking that since they do work for Geico that they would be fair. The adjuster JY was unprofessional and is in the wrong business dealing with all types of ppl. Two supervisor called me to talk with me and was all nice but wanted me to give them a call and when something did come up no answer . They raised the price up and was about to put savage parts on from junk yards!!! Then broke my truck down of unnecessary parts , sent me 3 pic of my truck where the damage was and made a mistake and included pic of a Durango include with mine in the estimated online where they dropped the ball at so they could total my truck out. $7,500 their price after I was haggled on what should be fixed or not. The under part that I was told would be looked at by Geico in Macon under and told me that everything would be fixed and even sent a wrecker for it. When I saw this scam I sent for my truck to be taken to another shop of my choice in Trussville where I live at and the price dropped to $2500 . What’s the use of having insurance for 8yrs without any incidents and was deem not my fought and still getting the run around but I guess it’s just a moody thing then , I have a 1,500 rental car limit that I pay for in my and JY told me that it had to be back today mon 2-26-18 or they wasn’t going to extended it til the next day when my truck will be ready I’m the am, how about I called jay (sup) while I was at the shop because they needed to ask him something and he told me he was going to call them and did. They just threw my parts in the back of the bed and shipped with all the unecesary parts too! New parts hand to be shipped in . This is just a scam place too much unprofessionalism going on after JY started talking to nice nasty and rushing me off the phone like I was Bothering her! So after I go meet with the ppl in Macon and send all the paper work and the pictures that I have with m parts and the Durango and explain that I had to miss work tonight because of the treat that JY told me .Also the shop ppl a security system that pick up everything that she said to them about me and my truck which is very unrespectful because they played it back so I could hear her and what she said !!!!

name: Febra McGuire
text: Keey your car too long

resp.text: Febra, thank you for your feedback and we want to sincerely apologize for any inconveniences this may have caused you. We understand that Wally N. has contacted you and spoke to you regarding the back order of the items for your vehicle. We want to thank you for letting us address your concerns.

name: madd1966dh
text: Quality quick service,nice team members this is the place to fix your car

name: James Eunice
text: Amazing service. My wife went in with a small issue and they fixed it for free because it was just a clip out of place. They could have over charged her or said it was somthing bigger but they didnt just amazing people.

name: Leigh Cline
text: Very caring people, excellent results on repairing my BMW after someone backed into it. Like nothing ever happened.
